panels.description: Displays the average Download speed over the past 5m on the WAN interface.
panels.title: Current Download (bytes/s)

panels.description: Displays the average Upload speed over the past 5m on the WAN interface.
panels.title: Current Upload (bytes/s)

panels.description: Uptime percentile over last $timerange.
panels.title: Uptime (last $timerange)

panels.description: Uses the LAN interface's uptime as a proxy for how long the device has been powered on. _May not be accurate!_
panels.title: Cable Modem Uptime

panels.description: Time since WAN interface was brought up.
panels.title: WAN Uptime

panels.description: Displays general information about the device

targets.expr: sum(hitron_coda_cm_version_info{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) by (hw_version, model, serial, sw_version, vendor)

panels.title: System Information

panels.description: Displays general information about the device's router capabilities

targets.expr: sum(hitron_coda_router_sys_info{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) by (lan_ip, rf_mac, wan_ip4, wan_ip6, router_mode, dns4, dns6)

panels.title: Router Information

panels.description: Displays the average Download speed over the past 5m on the WAN interface.
panels.title: Current Download (bps)

panels.description: Displays the average Upload speed over the past 5m on the WAN interface.
panels.title: Current Upload (bps)

panels.description: Data (bytes) received and transmitted within the last $timerange
panels.title: Data Usage (last $timerange)

panels.description: The DHCP lease will expire in this amount of time.
panels.title: DHCP Lease Expiry

panels.description: Bytes/sec received/transmitted on the WAN interface
panels.title: WAN Usage (bytes/s)

panels.description: Bytes/sec received/transmitted on the WAN interface, averaged over the last $timerange
panels.title: WAN Usage (avg bps over $timerange)

panels.description: Total bytes received/transmitted on the WAN interface over the last $timerange
panels.title: WAN Usage (bytes per $timerange)

panels.description: Displays the average size (in bytes) per packet seen on the WAN interface.
panels.title: WAN Average Packet Size

panels.description: Packets/sec received/transmitted on the WAN interface
panels.title: WAN Usage (packets/s)

panels.description: Packets/s received/transmitted on the WAN interface, averaged over the last $timerange
panels.title: WAN Usage (avg packets/s over $timerange)

panels.description: Total packets received/transmitted on the WAN interface over the last $timerange
panels.title: WAN Usage (packets per $timerange)

panels.description: Bytes/sec received/transmitted on the LAN interface
panels.title: LAN Usage (bytes/s)

panels.description: Bytes/sec received/transmitted on the LAN interface, averaged over the last $timerange
panels.title: LAN Usage (avg bps over $timerange)

panels.description: Total bytes received/transmitted on the LAN interface over the last $timerange
panels.title: LAN Usage (bytes per $timerange)

panels.description: Signal strength in decibels per millivolt per channel on the downstream channels
panels.title: Downstream Signal Strength (dBmV)

panels.description: Signal-to-noise ratio in decibels per channel on the downstream channels
panels.title: Downstream Signal-to-noise ratio

panels.description: Count (per $timerange) of errored blocks which were either corrected or not.
panels.title: Downstream Corrected/Uncorrected blocks (last $timerange)

panels.description:
Plots the upstream signal strength, in dBmV (dB above/below 1 mV). Unused ports with a strength of 0dBmV are omitted.

Usually these values will remain constant, but some fluctuation can occur over time.
panels.title: Upstream Signal Strength (dBmV)

panels.description: Currently-active downstream channels. This usually stays static under normal operation.
panels.title: Downstream Active Ports

panels.description: Overview of each downstream channel
panels.title: Downstream Overview

panels.description: Overview of each upstream channel
panels.title: Upstream Overview

panels.description: Currently-active upstream channels. This usually stays static under normal operation.
panels.title: Upstream Active Ports
